1.0.0.en: First release of adding washer sensors to Homey. To support all washmachines compatible with SmartThings

1.0.1.en: Made sure the changed flow card now works

1.0.2.en: Changed custom RestAPI's in SmartThings wrapper. Also introduced flowcards

1.1.0.en: Added way more flow cards: Support for conditional(and) cards, support for inverted cards, support for specific job/state changes

1.2.0.en: Solved bug with pairing new devices. Added pairing option on adding your first device. Replaced images. Wrote instructions on how to get a personal access token. And other minor bug fixes
